allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: always check for Ansible collections in testing_check_dependencies

The collections check was only running inside testing_install_dependencies\(\),
which was only called when molecule was missing. This meant if molecule was
already installed but collections weren''t, the tests would fail with
"ansible.posix collection not found".

Now testing_check_dependencies\(\) always checks for collections and
auto-installs them if missing, regardless of molecule''s installation state.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: add docker-compose-v2 to prepare.yml and pin collection versions

- Added docker-compose-v2 package to prepare.yml for roles that need
  docker compose plugin in test containers
- Added test_sequence to molecule.yml to remove cleanup warning
- Pinned collection versions in requirements.yml compatible with Ansible 2.16.x:
  - ansible.posix: >=1.5.0,<2.0.0
  - community.general: >=8.0.0,<9.0.0
  - community.docker: >=3.0.0,<4.0.0

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
